Hello and welcome to my portfolio page!

My name is Angelina Lapin and I'm a passionate web developer based in Norway. I specialize in React and JavaScript frameworks. I love creating interactive and user-friendly web applications that provide seamless experiences. With a strong foundation in front-end development, I enjoy tackling complex challenges and building innovative solutions. My projects showcase my skills in React, state management, and API integration. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and improve my craft. Feel free to explore my portfolio to see some of my work. If you have any questions or would like to collaborate, don't hesitate to reach out. I'm excited to connect with fellow developers and share ideas. Thank you for visiting my portfolio page, and I hope you find my work inspiring!
